name: Sonie's Journey
description:
Sonie was travelling around the galaxy with is father, but an asteroid unfortunately hit their spaceship! Now Sonie must survive the planet's danger to collect crystals that can power up the spaceship, and allow him to go home!

Swallow, jump, and double jump your enemys out of the traps, use your head and reflexes to overcome the obstacles!

This game was made on 2019 Global Game Jam! In Recife, Pernambuco, Brasil.

Made by :

Beatriz Regis  - 2D Artist

Catarina Santiago - 2D Artist

Eduardo Frans - Programmer - Game Play Developer

Ícaro Levi - Programmer - Producer

Luiz Araújo - Animations

Nathália Albuquerque - Programmer - Scenes and Menu Designer.

Nara Araújo - Sounds/Music

Pedro Albano - Programmer - Enemy IA, Level Design.

Rafhael Ronny - Programmer - Character Gameplay, Physics System.
